comment: /**  * Handle the given uncaught exception thrown from an asynchronous method.  * @param ex the exception thrown from the asynchronous method  * @param method the asynchronous method  * @param params the parameters used to invoked the method  */
code: /**  * Handle the given uncaught exception thrown from an asynchronous method.  * @param ex the exception thrown from the asynchronous method  * @param method the asynchronous method  * @param params the parameters used to invoked the method  */ void handleUncaughtException(Throwable ex, Method method, Object... params).
